item.description: Most people ask where they can buy the stuffs from Chinese recipes.such as ( sauce, vege. spice, and so on) I guess it is a good time for us to go there to check it out. after DIM SUM August Moon Festival meetup, i will wait for all of you who interested in those food, at the same place entrance of the mall, the supermarket is inside the mall. i will be wait there about 5 mins. and all of you welcome to dim sun with us at 12pm, which just next to the mall. if you would like to attend it, please rsvp it too. thanks. see you there. if you cannot find us, please give me a call, 617-506-9136
item.how_to_find_us: I will wait outside the mall for only 5 mins.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Chinese Supermarket Trip
